ygData.subject: RE: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do not fear Tashan.  It is (the lower level version at least) only -11 to MR (-15 I think for the mid-level version). Doesn t stand a chance against the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> versus. Worth checking out. I did notice that with my drum I was able to
> resist 6 consecutive charms from an /con'd red evil eye while guarding a
> party thru Beholder in search of corpses two days ago. When he sucessfully
> Tashan'd me I fled, fortunately the party was all near the zone by then.

Do not fear Tashan. It is (the lower level version at least)
only -11 to MR (-15 I think for the mid-level version).
Doesn't stand a chance against the +50 - +100 MR you typically
get with Elemental and Guardian Rhythms going.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
